p: To zoom in on the energy (horizontal) axis, hold two fingers horizontally, centered around the energy you want to zoom in too, and move your fingers apart.

To zoom in on the counts (vertical) axis, hold two fingers vertically, centered around the counts you want to zoom in too, and move your fingers apart; the initial seperation of your fingers will determine the counts range that is zoomed in to.
Note that when the energy range is changed, either by zooming in or out in energy, or by using a single finger to change the energy range, the counts-axis range is automatically recalculated.
